alternative.text: This is the initial grid position. Move by typing 'east', 'west', 'north' or 'south'./n You can also type 'reenter' to interact with the current grid position.

savedVariable.confirmationText: Are you sure that you want your name to be '@playerName@'? @playerName@ is a fantastic name, but it can't ever be changed!
savedVariable.successText: Great! We will from now on call you by your name

nextEvent.text: This is the initial grid position. Move by typing 'east', 'west', 'north' or 'south'./n You can also type 'reenter' to interact with the current grid position.
